title: Biography students shortlisted for prize (The University of Buckingham)
text: ( Source : The University of Buckingham ) Two Biography DPhil students have been short-listed for a prestigious literary prize. The Biographers' Club awards the annual Tony Lothian Prize of Â£2, 000 for the best proposal for a biography by an
